name: gulp-iconizr
description: SVG + PNG icon kit generator â€” Gulp plugin wrapping around node-iconizr that creates a CSS icon kit from a bunch of SVG files, serving them as SVG / PNG sprites or embedded data URIs along with suitable CSS / Sass / LESS / Stylus etc. stylesheet resources and a JavaScript loader for easy integration into your HTML documents
author: Joschi Kuphal <joschi@kuphal.net> (https://jkphl.is)

scripts.test: gulp && istanbul test _mocha --report html -- test/*.js --reporter spec
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
